*   **Statistics:** 5 of the 8 products purchased were high quality. This implies 3 were low quality. This is important. It suggests that even if Alice claims something is high quality, she has still sold a considerable number of low-quality items.

Based on the selling history, there were 8 sales, 5 being high quality and 3 being low quality, and Alice recommended them all as high-quality. This is still less than $10,000. Therefore, based on the information provided, I will not buy the product.
